wikipedia_page.main: Thomas Bowstead Wilson (15 August 1882 – 11 October 1961)  was Archdeacon of Worcester from 1944 until his death.Wilson was educated at Charterhouse and Pembroke College, Cambridge and ordained deacon in 1906 and priest in 1907. After a curacy at Wakefield Cathedral he was Missioner of the Pembroke College, Cambridge Mission at Walworth. He held incumbencies in Suckley, Wolverley and Hartlebury before his archdeacon’s appointment.
